data: Verify that an 'Admit to' Order has been entered prior to completing the powerplan (NOT required for direct admit patients)
q4h, heart rate, respiratory rate, blood pressure, temperature
q2h, heart rate, respiratory rate, blood pressure, temperature
q1h, heart rate, respiratory rate, blood pressure, temperature
q12h, heart rate, respiratory rate, blood pressure, temperature
Instruct patient to use Dove soap and apply dermabase cream to entire body qdaily
Review the most current diet order for therapeutic requirements, food texture and fluid thickness.  Add anything to be carried forward to the new Diet Order
Age 9-12 months, Texture Minced and Moist 5
Age 1-3 years, Texture Soft and Bite Sized 6
Age 4-8 years, Texture, Regular and Easy to Chew 7
Age 9-13 years, Texture, Regular and Easy to Chew 8
Age 14-18 years, Texture, Regular and Easy to Chew 9
Provider must order starting diet.  RN or RD to place subsequent diet orders.
dextrose 5% - sodium chloride 0.9% (dextrose 5%-sodium chloride 0.9% (D5NS) continuous infusion
76 mg/kg. IV, q6h, drug form: inj
50 mg/kg, IV, q6h, drug form: inj
Consider running fluids at maintenance or higher during concurrent acyclovir therapy.
10 mg/kg, IV, q8h, drug form: inj
Sulfamethoxazole-trimethoprim (cotrimoxazole 400 mg-80 mg tab (dosed as trimethoprim)
2.5 mg/kg, PO, BID Sat Sun, drug form: tab
Sulfamethoxazole-trimethoprim (cotrimoxazole 40 mg-8 mg/mL oral liq (dosed as trimethoprim)
2.5 mg/kg, PO, BID Sat Sun, drug form: oral liq
4 mg/kg, IV, q4week, drug form: inj
9 mg/kg, nebulized, once, drug form: inj
300 mg, nebulized, once, drug form: inj
PED BMT Electrolyte and Fluid Replacement
PED BMT Graft Versus Host Disease (GvHD) (Module)
